title: 20 Rp

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Hey Riot Can i have 20 rp??
im 20 rp away from a 975 skin, can u guys please gift me 20 rp? i really want the championship riven.

replies.body:
We *may* be able to work something out if you write in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to us.

Let me know if you have any questions.
